mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.terminal_no AS "terminalNo", a.terminal_name AS "terminalName", a.terminal_ip AS "terminalIp", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.program_tactic_id AS "programTactic.id", a.notice_id AS "notice.id", a.screenshot AS "screenshot", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o5.name AS "office.name", n.notice_name AS "notice.noticeName", p.name AS "programTactic.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o5 ON o5.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN cabinetms_notice n on n.id = a.notice_id LEFT JOIN cabinetms_program_tactic p on p.id = a.program_tactic_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cabinetms_terminal( id, terminal_name, terminal_ip, office_id, program_tactic_id, notice_id, screenshot, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{terminalName}, #{terminalIp}, #{office.id}, #{programTactic.id}, #{notice.id}, #{screenshot}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cabinetms_terminal SET terminal_name = #{terminalName}, terminal_ip = #{terminalIp}, office_id = #{office.id}, program_tactic_id = #{programTactic.id}, notice_id = #{notice.id}, screenshot = #{screenshot}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE cabinetms_terminal
status = #{status},
screenshot = #{screenshot},
update_date = #{updateDate},
